name: Hanz de Fuko Quicksand – Premium Men’s Hair Styling Wax & Dry Shampoo for a High Hold, Ultra Matte Finish – Ideal Texture Product for Thin, Thick and All Hair Types – 2 oz, Travel Size
short_description: Limitless Styling Possibilities: This groundbreaking formulation is one part styling wax, one part dry shampoo. This high-hold product adds volume, absorbs excessive oil, and adds texture with zero weight.

Matte Styling Masterpiece: Ideal for thick or thin hair, Quicksand provides a “sea salt”, ultra-matte finish and adds great lift to second-day hair. It’s great for achieving beachy textured looks with high volume and hold. The product also works as a pre-styler when cocktailing with other Hanz de Fuko products for amplified control.

Helps Promote Healthy Hair: Quicksand is rich in botanical ingredients that strengthen hair. Jojoba oil moisturizes the hair and prevents hair loss, castor seed oil strengthens hair follicles and promotes hair growth, horsetail fern extract relieves scalp irritation and helps reduce dandruff, and eucalyptus extract promotes thicker hair and stimulates hair growth. The gritty formula also contains diatomaceous earth, a soft granular rock similar to pumice that sucks up excess oil on the hair and scalp.

Easy to Apply, Lasts All Day: Rub a small pinch between your fingertips and apply to second-day hair beginning at the roots for added lift and texture. Apply to damp hair and blow dry for gravity defying volume.
Premium Hair Products Since 2009: Founded in Los Angeles, Hanz de Fuko has built up a passionate following as a result of our commitment to high quality, innovative hair and beauty products.

name: Redone Hair Styling Matte Wax Green 150ml | Ultra Hold & Maximum Control | Matte Finish No Shine Hair Wax for Men & Women | Coconut Scent | Non-Greasy Texturizing | Professional Barber Styling
short_description: ULTRA HOLD WITH NATURAL MATTE FINISH: Redone Hair Styling Matte Wax Green offers intense hold with a perfectly natural, matte finish. Designed for men and women, this professional wax provides strong definition without shine or stickiness. Ideal for achieving textured, structured, or casual looks that stay in place all day while maintaining a soft, touchable feel and flexible control.

NO SHINE – JUST PURE TEXTURE & CONTROL: Enjoy a completely matte, shine-free look that enhances your hair’s natural volume. This unique formula adds dimension and structure, making it perfect for messy, modern, or short cropped styles. Whether you’re styling at home or in the barbershop, it ensures clean, precise, and effortless definition.

COCONUT SCENTED & FRESHLY BALANCED FORMULA: Infused with a light coconut fragrance, this wax adds a refreshing tropical note to your styling routine. The subtle scent is long-lasting yet never overpowering, keeping your hair smelling clean and vibrant all day. It’s the ideal finishing touch to a professional grooming experience.

NON-GREASY, EASY TO APPLY & WASH OUT: This water-based formula glides easily through the hair, giving full control without heaviness or residue. It allows smooth, even application, and rinses out instantly with water — no buildup, no flakes, just clean styling every time. Perfect for daily use by both professionals and casual users.

BARBER-TRUSTED QUALITY FOR EVERY HAIR TYPE: Used by barbers around the world, Redone Matte Wax Green provides consistent hold and texture for all hair types — fine, thick, straight, or wavy. Its balanced formula keeps your hair manageable and styled under any condition. Each 150ml jar offers long-lasting use and reliable, salon-quality performance.

name: TIGI Bed Head Manipulator Texturizing Putty, Firm Hold Styling Putty for Short to Medium Hair, 2.01 oz
short_description: TAME THE MANE: Manipulator is our signature firm hold styling putty, designed and used by professional stylists. Reach for Manipulator when you need every strand of hair in its place for your show-stopping style

SALON RESULTS AT HOME: Enjoy salon-quality results from the comfort of your home. With a firm hold and a natural finish, Bed Head's Manipulator brings instant texture and style power to your hair that will have everyone asking where you got it done

FIRM HOLD FORMULA: Ozokerite builds texture for control, hold & thicker hair; Propylene Glycol retains moisture to fight frizz & humidity; Styling-Boosting Polymers create 'style scaffolding' for even application & flexible hold

FOR SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR: Manipulator adds definition, body, and texture to the hair and provides style control. The putty helps to defend hairstyles from frizz and humidity with a strong, flexible hold for incredible, show-stealing texture and style

THE FINISHING TOUCH: Work a small amount through clean hair for a natural finish. Use hands to scrunch, twist or spike into shape for a finished look. Let your hair air dry or gently blast to dry, on wet or finished dry hair
product_description: BED HEAD BY TIGI MANIPULATOR TEXTURIZING PUTTY When your style demands serious texture and definition, reach for the Manipulator. This signature firm hold styling putty is designed with and used by professional stylists to give you complete control over every strand. Perfect for when you need show-stopping style with texture that refuses to budge. Salon Results, Natural Finish: Enjoy salon-quality results from the comfort of your home with Manipulator's firm hold and natural finish. This styling putty brings instant texture and style power to your hair that will have everyone asking where you got it done - but you'll never tell. Powered by Style-Building Technology: Ozokerite builds texture for control, hold, and thicker-looking hair, while Propylene Glycol retains moisture to fight frizz and humidity. Our Styling-Boosting Polymers create 'style scaffolding' for even application and flexible hold that moves with you. Perfect for Short to Medium Hair: Manipulator adds definition, body, and serious texture while providing total style control. This putty helps defend your hairstyles from frizz and humidity with strong, flexible hold for incredible, show-stealing texture and style that lasts. Your Hair, Your Rules: Work a small amount through clean hair for a natural finish, then let your creativity take over. Use your hands to scrunch, twist, or spike into shape for your finished look. Whether you air dry for effortless texture or blast dry for extra hold, Manipulator works on both wet and dry hair. How to Use: Work a small amount between palms to warm Apply to clean, damp or dry hair from roots to ends Scrunch, twist, or spike hair into desired shape Air dry for natural texture or blow dry for firmer hold Rework throughout the day as needed

name: TIGI Bed Head Manipulator Matte Wax Gel for Unisex 2 Ounce (Pack of 2)
short_description: HOLD AND CONTROL: Manipulator Matte Hair Wax Paste delivers a strong hold with a soft, light matte finish, giving you all-day style without leaving behind grease and shine

SALON RESULTS AT HOME: Manipulator Matte is our signature styling paste for short-to-medium length hair, giving shine-free style and a long-lasting hold. Designed and used by style professionals, you'll love the salon results from home

BOLD TEXTURE THAT TAKES HOLD: Manipulator Matte grips hard and holds up, keeping your short styles and textured looks fixed in place when it's your turn to steal the show. Tame flyaways and present your look exactly how you want with long-lasting hold

STRONG HOLD, NO SHINE: Powered by beeswax and carnauba wax for flexible, workable texture with strong hold, plus babassu oil to condition and keep your style matte, defined, and reshapeable all day long

LOCK IT IN: Scoop a small amount of Manipulator Matte between palms to warm and activate the wax, then work into dry hair with fingers for grip and shape. Want more hold? Layer it in and sculpt your style to perfection
product_description: BED HEAD BY TIGI MANIPULATOR MATTE HAIR WAX Hold and control your ultimate style with Manipulator Matte from Bed Head This powerful paste delivers strong, all-day hold with a soft, light matte finish that keeps your style locked in without any grease or unwanted shine. Crafted with beeswax and carnauba wax, Manipulator Matte gives you flexible, workable texture that you can reshape and restyle throughout the day. Babassu oil adds conditioning power to keep your hair healthy while maintaining that perfect matte look. Whether you're going for spiky, twisted, or piecey styles, this formula tames flyaways and gives you complete control over short to medium length hair. Designed with and used by salon professionals, Manipulator Matte brings that expert-level styling experience straight to your bathroom. No more expensive salon visits for a look that stays put. This is the shine-free, long-lasting hold you've been searching for, all in a compact 2.01 oz jar. Application is simple: scoop a small amount between your palms to warm and activate the wax, then work it into dry hair with your fingers for instant grip and shape. Need even more hold? Layer in additional product and sculpt your style exactly how you want it. The result is textured, defined hair that stays exactly where you put it, ready to steal the show from morning to night. Perfect for short styles, layered cuts, and anyone who wants salon-quality texture and control without the salon price tag. Manipulator Matte is your go-to for creating looks that are as bold and unapologetic as you are.
